meanings.sent1: The garden looked so bloomless in the winter.
meanings.sent2: The bloomless tree stood bare in the field.
meanings.sent3: The bloomless plant joked, 'I'm saving my energy for next spring!'
meanings.sent4: Her face was as bloomless as a desert landscape.
meanings.sent5: The room felt empty and bloomless without any flowers.

meanings.definition: Without the ability to bloom or produce flowers.
meanings.sent1: The bloomless shrub had never blossomed.
meanings.sent2: The bloomless rose bush puzzled the gardener.
meanings.sent3: The bloomless cactus complained, 'I'm just not a morning plant.'
meanings.sent4: His creativity felt as bloomless as a wilted bouquet.
meanings.sent5: The field seemed dull and bloomless without any flowering plants.
